content.description: You will hear two excerpts from an orchestral work. Each excerpt will be played twice. Then the two excerpts will be played once, with a slight pause between them. Before listening to the each excerpt for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the texture?

choices.label: Melody with countermelody and chordal accompaniment

content.answer: Melody with countermelody and chordal accompaniment

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in performed music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
